entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,137Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 77

Summary: There were rumours all over Gotham of the ‚Äòprince‚Äô crashing out. There were pictures of Bruce Wayne in the news in which he was waving away the paparazzi as he walked out of a drug store carrying an armful of painkillers at three in the morning; wandering around in Crime Alley with a dime bag and a half-empty bottle of whiskey more expensive than most people could even dream about‚Äîand that same image came up in the news next to one of him in a gurney, bruises all over his face and body, unconscious. Some people thought it was understandable, considering one of his adopted kids had just gone missing. Others thought it was a disgrace for a man to be acting like this when the police were doing everything in their power to bring the kid back... Everything in the world is about sex, except sex. Sex is about power. After Jason died, Bruce was a wreck. He went off the deep end, succumbing to vices he'd never touched before. He lost himself in decisions he hoped he could leave in his past, but they're catching up faster than he's willing to meet them

entry.title: The Outer Layers
entry.summary:
Author: aerey

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,741Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 88

Summary: Bruce Wayne's life is a perfect, messy struggle. Clark's life on the other hand, is honestly just a struggle. For Bruce, raising five kids is no easy feat, but with the constant support from his found family, they've been able to make do. Clark, a high school biology teacher, has just moved to Gotham after a bad breakup, trying desperately to make ends meet with a smile. The only thing they have in common? At the end of the day, they can find themself alone. As CEO of Wayne Enterprises, coming home to an empty bed (except for when one of his kids has a nightmare) after a long day is something he tries not to think about too hard. For Clark, night is when the connections he's severed start to gnaw and the things he's lost can catch up. And then their paths cross. Clark Kent is like no one Bruce has ever met and has a smile that could light up a dark room. Bruce is just a little too good at getting Clark to drop his defenses, and as they help one another, the connection deepens. The two are hopeless and awful at communicating, but some things are worth the effort, right?

entry.title: raison d'√™tre
entry.summary:
Author: ilovepinkandcoffee

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,171Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 226

Summary: (n.) a reason for existingA year after the Riddler‚Äôs attack on Gotham, Batman struggles to repair a city fractured and drowning in crime. But when rumors spread through Gotham‚Äôs criminal underworld about an alien hero in Metropolis‚Äîan otherworldly figure with god-like powers who‚Äôs changing the course of history‚ÄîBruce can't help but be skeptical. But his concerns are confirmed when this so-called "Superman," arrives in Gotham one night during his patrol, bringing with him a wave of chaos that threatens to disrupt the fragile balance he has fought so hard to maintain.Clark had heard about Gotham City when he first arrived at Metropolis‚Äîa lawless, crime-ridden city plagued with corruption‚Äîbut he had never felt the need to enter its borders. That is until he learns of a mysterious vigilante known as "The Batman," a figure who, like him, seeks justice for his city and its people, his curiosity gets the better of him. Drawn to the idea of meeting someone with a shared mission, Clark decides to seek out the elusive hero, after all, nothing bad can come out of it can it? But boy was he wrong.
